title: Johnson & Johnson Stock Takes Off in After-Hours Trading After Baby-Powder Tests Show No Asbestos
text:
Johnson & Johnson said Tuesday afternoon that the company had run 15 new tests on the single bottle of baby powder in which the Food and Drug Administration earlier this month found asbestos and detected no trace of the substance.

The FDA finding led Johnson & Johnson (ticker: JNJ) to recall 33,000 bottles from a single lot of Johnson’s Baby Powder. The recall shook the stock, coming as the company faces down a tidal wave of personal injury litigation, including 15,000 lawsuits brought by plaintiffs who claim to have...
